title: Fred Merkle portrait no longer needed
author: the 'stache

posts.post_title: Fred Merkle portrait no longer needed
posts.post_content:
Hey everybody,

I'm in the market for a nice T206 Fred Merkle portrait, SGC graded or unslabbed preferred, common back. I'm consider anything in the very good range. Should have fairly nice centering (does not need to be perfect), minor creasing is ok so long as it does not take away from the eye appeal. No paper loss please.

PM or post here if you have anything available. Please include a scan and what you're looking for delivered.

Thank you!

Bill

Card has been purchased. Thanks again, Rob!
